items.title: B2B Marketing: Customer Segmentation Strategies And Models
items.headline: Deploy the "Jobs-to-be-done" framework to add strategic depth to your segmentation model.
objectives_summary: Segmentation by Customer Workflow: Discover new customer segments to drive revenue growth. Prioritize attractive segments for product development and go-to-market optimization.

Segmentation by Customer Application: Revolutionize your segmentation strategy with the "jobs-to-be-done" framework. Ensure that you are not missing out on attractive segments resulting from changing customer trends and applications.

Pricing Segmentation: Different customer segments value product features and benefits differently. Ensure that your pricing strategy is tailored to the target customer segments and their specific needs.
